A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The low-speed 2 hour chase made me feel like I was watching the OJ Simpson\, white bronco\, chase all over again.  I kept wondering why the bad guys didn't just send a couple of ships in hyperspace (sorry\, light speed) ahead of the rebels and blow them to bits.  And then Laura Dern\, with her purple hair\, destroys the bad guys' fleet with one ship going into hyperspace (sorry\, light speed).  It's too bad the rebels didn't know you could do this in the previous movies.  They could've just blown up all three death stars with one ship each.  Overall\, this movie was a very loud collection of logic errors and plot holes\, with a few decent parts here and there.
